title: Kevin Jonas wears distressed double denim on dinner date with wife Danielle in West Hollywood
text:
He joined his brothers Nick and Joe on stage to perform at Radio.com's We Can Survive music festival at the Hollywood Bowl on Saturday night.

And after the gig, Kevin Jonas, 31, treated his wife Danielle, 33, to dinner at celebrity-friendly Craig's.

The couple, who've been married since 2009, were snapped leaving the eatery arm-in-arm.

Date night: Kevin Jonas, 31, treated his wife Danielle, 33, to dinner at celebrity-friendly Craig's in West Hollywood on Saturday and they were snapped leaving the eatery arm-in-arm

The pair were simpatico in ripped denim with Kevin opting for a denim jacket that had a black leather collar to go with his distressed skinny jeans.

He added a black tee and black ankle boots.

His wife paired her pale blue high-waist jeans with a crop top and matching duster.

She stepped out in a pair of white mules with heels and ostrich feathers.

Ripped: Kevin opted for a denim jacket that had a black leather collar to go with his distressed skinny jeans. He added a black tee and black ankle boots

Flashed midriff: Danielle paired her pale blue high-waist jeans with a crop top and matching duster. She stepped out in a pair of white mules with heels and ostrich feathers

Gig: Kevin and Danielle's dinner date came after the musician performed with brothers Nick and Joe at Radio.com's We Can Survive music festival at the Hollywood Bowl

His choice of a long-sleeved jacket meant his latest tattoo in honor of Danielle was covered up on his night out.

Kevin took to Instagram last week to show off the inking which shows her as a line-drawn image in a glamorous gown.

It's inspired by the costume Danielle wore when she appeared in The Jonas Brothers music video for Sucker.

In the caption of his Instagram post, Kevin wrote: 'So proud of this time in our life and getting to remember this with @daniellejonas forever!'

New ink: Kevin took to Instagram last week to show off his latest tattoo which is a line-drawn image of Danielle in a glamorous gown.
description: The couple, who've been married since 2009, were snapped leaving celebrity-friendly Craig's arm-in-arm.
